page.title: 10LEISURE
page.content: People in "D block" work hard at leisure . Children have youth club, guides, scouts, brownies, cubs, choir, badminton, horse riding, walking, orchestra ,village shows, Sunday club, cycling and dancing. Keeping fit is a craze and many people jog, others are keen gardeners. For swimming, ice skating, five-a-side football we travel to Thornaby , Stockton, Darlington and Billingham. Computer games are Pacman ,Frogger , Spannerman but reading novels is a popular pastime.Churchy ,Wonderwoman , Kingy are popular outdoor games. Board we play Monopoly ,Scrabble ,Chess , Cluedo.Many children play wind and string instruments as well as the piano.Adult leisure time is spent on sport but many do handicrafts such as lace making and cookery at classes.
